001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.authentication;
002
003import com.google.common.base.Preconditions;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.KnownApiVersion;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication.Jpake3SessionKeyRequest;
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.Hex;
012
013import java.util.Arrays;

015/**
016 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication.Jpake3SessionKeyRequest}, opCode 39, size 18

018 * <br>
019 *
020 * 
021 * <table border='1'>
022 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
023 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>39</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>

028 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.authentication.Jpake3SessionKeyRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
029 * </table>
030 */
031@MessageProps(
032    opCode=39,
033    size=18,
034    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
035    minApi=KnownApiVersion.API_V3_2,
036    characteristic=Characteristic.AUTHORIZATION,
037    request=Jpake3SessionKeyRequest.class
038)
039public class Jpake3SessionKeyResponse extends Message {
040    private int appInstanceId;
041    private byte[] deviceKeyNonce;
042    private byte[] deviceKeyReserved;
043
044    public static byte[] RESERVED = new byte[]{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0};
045
046    public Jpake3SessionKeyResponse() {}
047
048    public Jpake3SessionKeyResponse(byte[] raw) {
049        parse(raw);
050    }
051
052    public Jpake3SessionKeyResponse(int appInstanceId, byte[] nonce, byte[] reserved) {
053        parse(buildCargo(appInstanceId, nonce, reserved));
054        Preconditions.checkState(this.appInstanceId == appInstanceId);
055        Preconditions.checkState(Hex.encodeHexString(this.deviceKeyNonce).equals(Hex.encodeHexString(nonce)));
056        Preconditions.checkState(Hex.encodeHexString(this.deviceKeyReserved).equals(Hex.encodeHexString(reserved)));
057    }
058
059    /**
060     * <table border="1">
061     * <caption>Parsed fields for Jpake3SessionKeyResponse:</caption>
062     * <tr><td><code>appInstanceId</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(Arrays.copyOfRange(raw, 0, 2), 0)</code></td></tr>
063     * <tr><td><code>deviceKeyNonce</code></td><td><code>Arrays.copyOfRange(raw, 2, 10)</code></td></tr>
064     * <tr><td><code>deviceKeyReserved</code></td><td><code>Arrays.copyOfRange(raw, 10, 18)</code></td></tr>
065     * </table>
066     */
067    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
068        Preconditions.checkArgument(raw.length == props().size());
069        this.cargo = raw;
070        this.appInstanceId = Bytes.readShort(Arrays.copyOfRange(raw, 0, 2), 0);
071        this.deviceKeyNonce = Arrays.copyOfRange(raw, 2, 10); // 8
072        this.deviceKeyReserved = Arrays.copyOfRange(raw, 10, 18); // 8
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * <table border="1">
077     * <caption>Byte layout for Jpake3SessionKeyResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
078     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
079     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(appInstanceId) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
080     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(appInstanceId) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
081     * </table>
082     */
083    public static byte[] buildCargo(int appInstanceId, byte[] nonce, byte[] reserved) {
084        return Bytes.combine(
085                Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(appInstanceId),
086                nonce,
087                reserved
088        );
089    }
090
091    public int getAppInstanceId() {
092        return appInstanceId;
093    }
094
095    public byte[] getDeviceKeyNonce() {
096        return deviceKeyNonce;
097    }
098
099    public byte[] getDeviceKeyReserved() {
100        return deviceKeyReserved;
101    }
102}
